author: philip
msg: When upgrading set the file_external flag in file-external NODES rows
and use that to set kind='file' in the EXTERNALS rows.  This is like
r1167304 but with working SQL.  The issue 4015 regression test is
still XFail as external dirs behave differently in upgraded and pure
(upgrade_file_externals): Do a second relocate on a nested external.
Note difference between upgraded and pure 1.7 working copies.
